sections.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. This particular course will be asynchronous, meaning you can engage with the material weekly at your own pace, but there is also an opportunity to have a more traditional, real-time classroom experience. Thursday is our high-contact day: you can attend an interactive, virtual class session from 2-3 p.m. PT (a recording will be available afterward), meet with your TA by video or chat during office hours, and share work with your small group, if necessary.
This is a blended learning course where 50% of the course takes place in-class and 50% online.

description: An exploration of and practice in the writing of poetry, focusing on how a writer employs the technical elements of the craft of poetry. Manuscript submission not required for admission.
